document_data.caption: The Realms Master in [[Shadowdale]]
document_data.name: Realms Master
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Realms Master''''' was a [[caravel]], and [[Halruaan skyship|skyship]], piloted by the [[Halruaan]] [[wizard]], [[Dwalimar Omen]].

The ship had the standard capabilities of a sea-going vessel, but also had the magical ability of flight and teleportation. The ''Realms Master'' had as a figurehead the image of [[Azuth]], god of mages and consort of [[Mystra]].<ref>{{Cite comic/DC FR comic 01}}
